method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the fields to their default value.

field.name: IsInitialized
field.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the fields to their default value.

field.name: IsInitialized
field.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _ap_changethememode:
method.comment: Change the Thememode (0 = lightmode, 1 = darkmode)

method.name: _ap_createsong::::::::
method.comment: trackid (A uniqe id [int]) dir (Track directory path) filename (Track filename) title (Set the Title that will be shown in Player) favorite (Set if favorite Boolean) trackimgHD (Set bitmap that will show in Player HD) trackimgSD (Set bitmap that will show in Song list for this track SD) videoUrl (Set the video URL to open it on button click. If is emptry, Youtube will be opened with Title string and search for the track video)

method.name: _ap_pause
method.comment: Pause the Player

method.name: _ap_playlistpath:
method.comment: Set the Playlistpath where all playlists will be saved and loaded from

method.name: _ap_playnexttrack
method.comment: Play next Track

method.name: _ap_playprevioustrack
method.comment: Play previous Track

method.name: _ap_playtrack:
method.comment: Play Track with selected index

method.name: _ap_recreateplaylist
method.comment: Recreates the Playlist again if it is missing

method.name: _ap_recreatetracklist
method.comment: Recreates the Tracklist again if it is missing

method.name: _ap_returnbasepanel
method.comment: Return Base Panel as Panel

method.name: _ap_returncurrenttrackindex
method.comment: Return current Track index that is playing

method.name: _ap_returnspecialbuttonspanel
method.comment: Return Special controls Panel as Panel

method.name: _ap_returntitlelabel
method.comment: Return Title Label as Label

method.name: _ap_setloopplay:
method.comment: If true the list will continue playing when finished

method.name: _ap_setskipseconds:
method.comment: Set the skip seconds. clicking the skip buttons will forward or backward the track for x seconds

method.name: _ap_show
method.comment: Show Player with animation from bottom to top

method.name: _ap_showspecialbuttons:
method.comment: Show/hide special controls on bottom of the screen

method.name: _ap_songlist
method.comment: Return full songlist (holds type objects)

method.name: _ap_songpath:
method.comment: Set the Songpath that will be the startpath in the FileDialog

method.name: _ap_songpathlongclick:
method.comment: Set a second Songpath that will be the startpath in the FileDialog (will be raised on longclick)

method.name: _initialize::::::::
method.comment: myApp (App As Application) CallBack (Sender page) CallPanel (Panel that will hold tha player like Page.Rootpanel) Event (Object Event to handle CallSub() Method) ThemeMode (0 = Lightmode, 1 = Darkmode) BackgroundPlay (Allow player to play in background) ShowScreenControls (Show extra controls on bottom)
